input_text:
Job Title: Brand Ambassador 

Location: Savannah, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Marketing, Public Relations

Description:
If you are looking for something more than just an entry-level position you have come to the right place! At Higher Ground Events we are looking for energetic and hard-working Brand Ambassadors to balance our team of highly talented marketing professionals.
Skills & Experience:· Excellent people/communicating skills (Bilingual skills are a plus)· Minimum of a High school diploma or GED.· Prior experience working with the public is preferable but not necessary!· Must be goal-oriented and a driving team ambition.· Experience working towards team goals – scholastic or vocational.· Must be highly organized and efficient.· Values of honesty and integrity are MUST.· Must be able to learn in a fast paced environment in order to demonstrate clients’ products.· Basic marketing and IT knowledge is a definite plus!· Must have an outgoing and friendly manner at all times.
Brand Ambassador Responsibilities:· Communication with clients and customers on a daily basis.· Learn and apply critical foundations of marketing and leadership in the office and field assignments.· Attain brand knowledge to be able to answer all questions regarding the benefits of a client’s products to customers.· Meet with customers at live events to showcase client products.· Organize, track and record daily sales.· Work with a marketing team to build brand and customer base for clients.· Travel to marketing events as needed.· Attend scheduled team and company meetings.· Must be able to travel to numerous locations.
Benefits of Working with Higher Ground Events :· Advance at your own pace and the only limit to your earning potential is YOU!· Opportunity for career and personal growth.· Travel to bring customers’ products to new audiences all the time.· Amazing compensation for marketing sales.· Upward growth with the company – we always promote from within!· Become a team leader through drive and motivation in record time.· Attend awards ceremonies - you could be next year’s top performer!· Networking prospects on a daily basis.· Learn marketing and business skills from award-winning marketing professionals from all around the world.
About Higher Ground Events:
Thriving as a liaison between exclusive clientele and consumers, Higher Ground Events is creating experiences to cultivate lifelong customers and brand loyalty for clients. Springing into the Georgia scene with a massive client portfolio and a team with years of experience, Higher Ground is breaking the boundaries of the digital age by bringing customers closer to brands than ever before. 
We are currently seeking a Brand Ambassador with a desire to grow alongside a group of like-minded entrepreneurs.If you are looking for a career with a great amount of potential growth, click the Apply button to submit your resume. We look forward to hearing from you today!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Brand Ambassador
output_json.summary: Looking for energetic and hard-working Brand Ambassadors to join a team of marketing professionals.
job_responsibilities: Communication with clients and customers on a daily basis
Learn and apply critical foundations of marketing and leadership
Attain brand knowledge to answer questions about client products
Meet with customers at live events to showcase client products
Organize, track, and record daily sales
Work with a marketing team to build brand and customer base
Travel to marketing events as needed
Attend scheduled team and company meetings
Must be able to travel to numerous locations
benefits: Advance at your own pace with unlimited earning potential
Opportunity for career and personal growth
Travel to bring products to new audiences
Learn marketing and business skills from experienced professionals
output_json.company_information: Higher Ground Events is a liaison between exclusive clientele and consumers, creating experiences to cultivate lifelong customers and brand loyalty for clients.
